name: part_010
file: tmp_【#iofiGalaxyTicket】 Welcome to! Airani iofifteen 2024 Birthday 3D Live - Galaxy Ticket [UxNqEmXGO1s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Iofifteen and the guests gather 'paints' (colors) on stage, representing each guest's contribution.
Watame requests a 'palate cleanser', and Baelz goes to fetch a surprise.
Baelz presents a birthday cake as a surprise for Iofifteen, followed by a feeding segment and celebration.
Iofifteen remains alone on stage, summarizing the event so far and showing the palette of collected colors.

subtitles.original: Iofi Hospitality! Food Review!
subtitles.english: Iofi Hospitality! Food Review!

subtitles.original: みんなに...
subtitles.english: Everyone...

subtitles.original: えっ、ちゃんととあるものをちょっと欲しいんだ、みんなから。
subtitles.english: Uh, I actually want something from all of you.

subtitles.original: おお！集めてるんでしょ、なんか。
subtitles.english: Oh! You're collecting something, right?

subtitles.original: そう！集めてる！プレゼントがありますから！
subtitles.english: Yes! We're collecting! We have presents!

subtitles.original: はーい、持ってきたよ。
subtitles.english: Yes, we brought them.

subtitles.original: じゃじゃーん！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original: そう、なんか今集めてるらしいから。ね、集めてんだ。
subtitles.english: Right, I heard she's collecting things. Yeah, she is.

subtitles.original: プレゼントです！どうぞ！絵具！
subtitles.english: It's a present! Here! Paints!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。青！
subtitles.english: Thank you. Blue!

subtitles.original: もうついてるよ！もうついてるから！
subtitles.english: It's already on! It's already on!

subtitles.original: ついたついた。赤色、ついたついた。
subtitles.english: It's on, it's on. Red, it's on.

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: じゃ、おためも。もらっていいですか。
subtitles.english: Well, some fun too. Can I have some?

subtitles.original: 欲しいか？ 欲しいです！
subtitles.english: Do you want it? I do!

subtitles.original: 可愛いおねだりしな。
subtitles.english: Ask for it nicely.

subtitles.original: 欲しいです。
subtitles.english: I want it.

subtitles.original: 可愛い！いいなー！
subtitles.english: So cute! Lucky!

subtitles.original: 可愛いー！可愛い！
subtitles.english: Cute! Cute!

subtitles.original: めっちゃめちゃ付けて。
subtitles.english: Put lots and lots on.

subtitles.original: はっ！じゃじゃーん！黄色、どうぞ。
subtitles.english: Ha! Ta-da! Yellow, here.

subtitles.original: 黄色、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Yellow, thank you.

subtitles.original: 僕のも欲しいかな？ Give me, give me, give me!
subtitles.english: Do you want mine too? Give me, give me, give me!

subtitles.original: 準備いいか？ え、怖。準備いいよ。
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Uh, scary. I'm ready.

subtitles.original: はーい！うぉー！
subtitles.english: Okay! Whoa!

subtitles.original: すげー！だいぶやったね。
subtitles.english: Amazing! You put a lot on.

subtitles.original: おお！素晴らしい！
subtitles.english: Oh! Wonderful!

subtitles.original: ありがとう。なまさらも、ね。イオフィさんはもうこの色でいるからね。
subtitles.english: Thank you. And Namasara too. Iofi is already in this color.

subtitles.original: うん、ありがとう。じゃこれで、はい。帰る...
subtitles.english: Yeah, thank you. Well with this, yeah. I'll go back...

subtitles.original: いやいやいや。
subtitles.english: No no no.

subtitles.original: あと最後にさ。なんかお口直しが欲しいな。
subtitles.english: And lastly. I want a palate cleanser.

subtitles.original: ねー、欲しいよね。ドリアンも良かったけどね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, we want one. Durian was good too, though.

subtitles.original: ベーちゃんさ、持ってきちゃってよ。
subtitles.english: Bae-chan, go ahead and bring it.

subtitles.original: 行ってきます！イオフィ、気になるだろ？
subtitles.english: I'm going! Iofi, you're curious, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 気になるだろ？イオフィ、何だと思う？
subtitles.english: Curious, right? Iofi, what do you think it is?

subtitles.original: ベジマイトかな？どうかな？気になる、ベジマイト。
subtitles.english: Maybe Vegemite? I wonder? I'm curious about Vegemite.

subtitles.original: じゃ、何かな？ 何かな？
subtitles.english: Well, what is it? What is it?

subtitles.original: 何だ、この音？ 怖いな。やばい、やばい。何かな？
subtitles.english: What's this sound? Scary. Oh boy. What is it?

subtitles.original: 何かな？ じゃーん！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: What is it? Ta-da! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！サプライズ！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Surprise!

subtitles.original: え、これ今日のためだけど、緊張しすぎて、もうプルプルしてる。
subtitles.english: Eh, this is for today, but I'm so nervous I'm shaking.

subtitles.original: プルプルしてる。ちょっと待って、ちょっと待って。
subtitles.english: Shaking. Wait a second, wait a second.

subtitles.original: 持たせてもらった方がいい。見せてあげて。すごいでしょう。
subtitles.english: It's better to let her hold it. Show her. Amazing, right?

subtitles.original: ありがとう。ちゃんと書いてあるよ。
subtitles.english: Thank you. It's written clearly.

subtitles.original: 大事。ありがとう。あーとか、あ、
subtitles.english: Important. Thank you. Aah, or...

subtitles.original: そらちゃんが「あーん」してくれるんじゃない、もしかして。
subtitles.english: Sora-chan is going to feed you, isn't she?

subtitles.original: あら、大丈夫。生クリームがちょっと取れないけど、
subtitles.english: Oh, it's okay. I can't quite get the whipped cream off, but...

subtitles.original: どうすればいいんだ。あ、果物、あ、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: What should I do? Ah, the fruit... ah, thank you.

subtitles.original: わあ、すげえ。あ、こんなの食べられるんだ。
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing. Ah, you can eat this.

subtitles.original: おっきいお口で食べて。じゃじゃーん。食べさせてもらって。
subtitles.english: Eat it with a big mouth. Ta-da. Let her feed you.

subtitles.original: はい、あーんして。はい、あーん。
subtitles.english: Okay, say 'aah'. Okay, aah.

subtitles.original: あーん。あ、
subtitles.english: Aahn. Ah,

subtitles.original: 美味しいです！やったー！
subtitles.english: It's delicious! Yay!

subtitles.original: イオフィ、誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Iofi, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: おめでとうー！イオフィちゃん、誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Iofi-chan, Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: Selamat Ulang Tahun! ということで。イオフィがみんなをおもてなし。
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday! And so, Iofi entertains everyone.

subtitles.original: イオフィ・ホスピタリティ・フードレビュー！フードレビュー！
subtitles.english: Iofi Hospitality Food Review! Food Review!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！おめでとう！サプライズケーキでした。
subtitles.english: Yay! Congratulations! It was a surprise cake.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！お祝いありがとう。
subtitles.english: Yay! Thanks for the celebration.

subtitles.original: Hai! Kembali lagi!
subtitles.english: Hi! I'm back!

subtitles.original: Eh, gila tadi guest-nya banyak banget gak?
subtitles.english: Eh, crazy, weren't there so many guests just now?

subtitles.original: いっぱいゲストね、ありがとう。
subtitles.english: So many guests, thank you.

subtitles.original: Terima kasih! Dan ya by the way...
subtitles.english: Thank you! And by the way...

subtitles.original: Terus tadi yang bawa kue, cake...
subtitles.english: Also, about the cake earlier...

subtitles.original: ada kikaku ni nai su.
subtitles.english: it wasn't in the plan.

subtitles.original: It was really a surprise! Apaan ini cake?
subtitles.english: It was really a surprise! What is this cake?

subtitles.original: Thank you, thank you for the cake. I really, I really wasn't expecting that. Thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you for the cake. I really, I really wasn't expecting that. Thank you.

subtitles.original: And by the way, do you remember? We were collecting colors.
subtitles.english: And by the way, do you remember? We were collecting colors.

subtitles.original: Can you see? ちょっと見てね。
subtitles.english: Can you see? Take a look.

subtitles.original: 色、集まったので。はい！
subtitles.english: Since the colors have been gathered. Here!

subtitles.original: ほら！いっぱいある！
subtitles.english: Look! There are so many!

subtitles.original: Look at that! We have all the colors. Look at that.
subtitles.english: Look at that! We have all the colors. Look at that.

subtitles.original: いや、本当にありがとうね。今日集まらなかったらどうしようと思って。
subtitles.english: No, really, thank you. I was worried what to do if they didn't gather today.

subtitles.original: So, I don't know. I mean, we have a lot of colors here.
subtitles.english: So, I don't know. I mean, we have a lot of colors here.

subtitles.original: Iofifteen, Shion, Oga, Sora-neesama...
subtitles.english: Iofifteen, Shion, Oga, Sora-neesama...

subtitles.original: Bae-chan, Polka, to Watame-paisen.
subtitles.english: Bae-chan, Polka, and Watame-paisen.

subtitles.original: いや、豪華だね。でも...
subtitles.english: Wow, so luxurious. But...

subtitles.original: Tapi ya, kalau ini kita semua dicampurin, diiniin...
subtitles.english: But you know, if we mixed all of these together, do this...

subtitles.original: Gimana ya?
subtitles.english: I wonder how it would be?

subtitles.original: え、これ全部混ぜたらどうなるんだろうね？
subtitles.english: Uh, what would happen if we mixed all of these?

subtitles.original: Let's try! Want to try? Want to try mixing all of the colors?
subtitles.english: Let's try! Want to try? Want to try mixing all of the colors?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、これで...
subtitles.english: Well then, with this...

subtitles.original: 塗りつぶしますね。ペイント、おお！じゃあ、はい！
subtitles.english: I'll paint over it. Paint, oh! Well then, here!
